drinks.name: Pink Drink
drinks.description: A refreshing coconut milk and strawberry acai blend
drinks.instructions: Ask for a 'Strawberry Acai Refresher with coconut milk instead of water and add freeze-dried strawberries'

drinks.name: Butterbeer Latte
drinks.description: Harry Potter inspired sweet and creamy latte
drinks.instructions: Order a 'Caffè Latte with 2 pumps cinnamon dolce syrup, 2 pumps toffee nut syrup, and caramel sauce on top'

drinks.name: Cookies and Cream Frappuccino
drinks.instructions: Ask for a 'Vanilla Bean Frappuccino with java chips, chocolate syrup blended in, topped with whipped cream and cookie crumbs'

drinks.name: Nutella Latte
drinks.description: Rich hazelnut and chocolate flavored latte
drinks.instructions: Order a 'Caffè Latte with 2 pumps hazelnut syrup, 1 pump mocha syrup, and whipped cream on top'

drinks.name: Vampire Frappuccino
drinks.instructions: Ask for a 'Strawberry Frappuccino with 1 pump raspberry syrup, mocha drizzle, and whipped cream'

drinks.name: Sunset Refresher
drinks.description: Beautiful orange and pink layered refresher
drinks.instructions: Order half 'Mango Dragonfruit Refresher' and half 'Peach Green Tea' with a splash of lemonade - ask them not to mix it

drinks.name: Birthday Cake Frappuccino
drinks.description: Celebratory vanilla cake flavored frozen drink
drinks.instructions: Ask for a 'Vanilla Bean Frappuccino with 1 pump hazelnut syrup, whipped cream, and rainbow sprinkles on top'

drinks.name: Caramel Apple Spice
drinks.description: Warm apple cider with caramel sweetness
drinks.instructions: Order 'Steamed apple juice with 2 pumps cinnamon dolce syrup, whipped cream, and caramel sauce on top'

drinks.name: Twix Frappuccino
drinks.description: Candy bar inspired caramel and chocolate treat
drinks.instructions: Ask for a 'Caramel Frappuccino with java chips, extra caramel drizzle, and whipped cream'

drinks.name: Dirty Shirley
drinks.description: Cherry-lime refresher with a grown-up twist
drinks.instructions: Order 'Passion Tea with 2 pumps liquid cane sugar, lemonade, and a light splash of coconut milk'
